More about me

Hi, I'm Selen. Nice to meet you!

I'm an enthusiastic self-taught Front-End Developer with a strong passion for creating innovative and user-friendly web applications. Naturally curious and quietly confident, I’m constantly learning and striving to improve my skills. Since starting my journey as a self-learner, I’ve completed specialized courses and developed responsive and dynamic projects that showcase my dedication to crafting seamless user experiences.

My love for web development and design fuels my ability to find creative solutions to technical challenges and bring visually captivating websites to life. With each passing day, I continue to deepen my technical knowledge and grow more passionate about what I do.

Let’s build something amazing together!
